isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install OUTER DOOR HANDLE

svcproc.title: Install OUTER DOOR HANDLE
svcproc.para: The outer door handle assembly (Item 1, Figure 79) is a combination handle and lever. It is connected by control rods to the latch assembly mechanism, and actuates the latch jaws.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position outer door handle assembly (Item 7) on outer cab door (Item 5) and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 6) and tighten to secure outer door handle assembly onto cab door, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 79 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Attach outer door handle control rod (Item 3) onto outer door handle assembly (Item 1) and slide retaining clip (Item 2) over outer door handle control rod, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Attach lock control rod (Item 2) onto door lock cylinder assembly (Item 3) and slide retaining clip (Item 1) onto lock control rod, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: If installing DRIVER SIDE OUTER DOOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY follow Steps 4 and 5 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcproc.para: If installing PASSENGER SIDE OUTER DOOR HANDLE ASSEMBLY follow Steps 6 and 7 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
